kv10.1:1.1: ☑ Upapattesiye pañcakkhandhe aniruddhe kiriyā pañcakkhandhā uppajjantīti?
kv10.1:1.3: Dasannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, dasa khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:1.5: dasannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, dasa khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:1.6: Āmantā. dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ …pe… dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti?
kv10.1:2.1: ☑ Upapattesiye pañcakkhandhe aniruddhe kiriyā cattāro khandhā uppajjantīti?
kv10.1:2.3: Navannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, nava khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:2.5: navannaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, nava khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:2.6: Āmantā. dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ …pe… dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti?
kv10.1:3.3: Channaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, cha khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:3.5: channaṃ khandhānaṃ samodhānaṃ hoti, cha khandhā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgacchantīti?
kv10.1:3.6: Āmantā. dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ …pe… dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti?
kv10.1:4.3: Mato maggaṃ bhāveti, kālaṅkato maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
